resources.string: 无法连接网络，请检查网络是否连接.

Note: Electronic signature is compulsory before you can proceed to use this application.

Note: The following PTWs were submitted for the same working location or may have overlapping work duration at the same location. Please assess or approve this PTW only when the PTWs are not deemed as incompatible.

本人在此声明所提供的所有信息都是真实且准确的。

在提交PTW之前，我将确保没有不兼容的工作，并确保所有安全控制措施均由负责人进行适当检查，直至工作完成。
在提交PTW之前，我将确保没有不兼容的工作，并确保所有安全控制措施均由负责人进行适当检查，直至工作完成。我还知道，在批准的时间之前不得开展任何工作。

将二维码图案放在取景框内，即可自动扫描。

I have verified all the checklists attached to this PTW, and I confirm that the safety control measures are in place when assessing this PTW and thereafter shall ensure it remain in place by the applicant’s until work completion by exercising close monitoring.
I shall ensure that there are no incompatible works before approving this permit and shall ensure that the safety control measures are duly checked by the person responsible until work completion.
我检查的时候以上都符合规范。

Tag can be number, alphabet, underscore, Chinese. Use , to split many tags.
Alias can be number, alphabet, underscore, Chinese.
